thread.title: Wendy Friedman
thread.title_full: Extra Space Storage reviewed by Wendy Friedman

author: Wendy Friedman
title: Wendy Friedman
text:
I truly couldn't be happier with a storage facility. The women running the facility are so dedicated & amazing! They keep everything so clean & are always willing to help. You can't find more conciencious employees & it really makes storing there a pleasure!
Thank you!!
